com.laughingmasq.pong

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.laughingmasq.pong.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    schme Combines logic and graphic. This class relays information between graphics and logic. See Board class to compare what part of logic is held in here, and what in Board.
